main.no_accounts_subtitle: Click the '+' icon to add your first account.
main.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

modals.export_subtitle: Save a backup of your accounts. The encrypted .enc file is the recommended and secure option.
modals.export_google_auth_instructions: Scan this QR code with Google Authenticator on your new device to import your accounts. Keep this code secure and close this window once you are done.
modals.export_google_auth_warning: Warning: Anyone who scans this QR code will have access to your accounts. Do not share it publicly.
modals.export_plain_warning: Warning: This will export your secret keys in plain text, which is insecure. Proceed with caution.
modals.encryption_password_label: Enter a password to encrypt this backup:
modals.import_subtitle_new: Import accounts from a .txt or .enc backup file.
modals.import_data_ready: Backup data unlocked. Choose an import method:
modals.import_merge_explanation: Adds new accounts from the backup to your existing vault. Duplicates will be skipped.
modals.import_overwrite_warning: Warning: This will delete ALL of your current accounts and replace them with the accounts from the backup.
modals.import_overwrite_checkbox_label: I understand this will replace all current data.
modals.import_confirm_message: Detected {{count}} accounts in the scanned QR. Do you want to merge them into your vault or overwrite all existing accounts?
modals.period_help: Default 30s. Do not change unless required by the service provider.
modals.algorithm_help: Default SHA1. Do not change unless required by the service provider.
modals.digits_help: Default 6. Do not change unless required by the service provider.

errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.current_password_incorrect: The current master password you entered is incorrect.
errors.invalid_secret_chars: Secret key contains invalid characters. Use Base32 characters (A-Z, 2-7).
errors.camera_permission_denied: Camera permission was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings to scan QR codes.
errors.qr_not_found: No QR code found in the image.
errors.import_decryption_failed: Failed to decrypt backup. The password may be incorrect or the file is corrupt.
errors.import_invalid_json: The backup file does not contain valid account data.
errors.qr_library_load_failed: QR Code library failed to load. Please check your network connection and try again.
errors.qr_generation_failed: Failed to generate QR code. Please try again.
errors.export_data_error: An error occurred while generating the export data.

prompts.import_password: Enter the password for this backup file:

alerts.export_failed: An error occurred during the export.
alerts.reset_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to reset the app? This will permanently delete all data.
alerts.reset_confirm_message_2: This action cannot be undone. Confirm reset?
alerts.delete_group_confirm: Delete group "{{groupName}}"? Accounts will be moved to 'All'.
